fields.name: NewContactMSG
fields.fieldText: Welcome! Please fill out the following information to register as a volunteer.” and then If this is not your first time registering, please click previous and use the same email.

fields.name: emaildisp
fields.fieldText: To make your registration easier please provide us with your email.

fields.name: ThankyouMSG
fields.fieldText:
Thanks for scheduling your shift, check your email for more information.

See you soon!
